auth.name: Name
auth.username-min-length: Username must be at least 3 characters long
auth.username-max-length: Username must be at least 32 characters long
auth.username-requirements: Username must only contain letters, numbers, dots and underscores
auth.password-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.password-max-length: Password must be at most 32 characters long
auth.unexpected-error: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
auth.no-account-username: No account with the username specified. Maybe you haven't registered yet?
auth.no-account-email: No account with the email specified. Maybe you haven't registered yet?
